name: Gotta hand it to yah!
description:
All of Santa's elves have been cursed to have no arms! well... except for you but thats besides the point.  You're gonna have to deliver letters, make presents, and collect coins to save Christmas all by yourself, and some smart guy decided to make Christmas last FIVE DAYS this year.

Play on newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/868271?updated=1671901138

Music used

https://pixabay.com/music/christmas-christmas-tree-chillhop-lofi-christmas-backg...

jhaeka https://joshuuu.itch.io/short-loopable-background-music

(I also made a couple of the songs)
